entities.description: Past year misuse of diazepam products including Valium, generic diazepam, or other tranquilizers containing diazepam.
Past year misuse of muscle relaxants like Flexeril and Soma.
Past year misuse of cyclobenzaprine products including Flexeril.
Past year misuse of Soma or other muscle relaxants containing carisoprodol.
Past year misuse of other tranquilizers including benzodiazepine tranquilizers, muscle relaxants, or over-the-counter products.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent has misused diazepam products in the past year.
Indicates whether the respondent has misused muscle relaxants in the past year.
Indicates whether the respondent has misused cyclobenzaprine products in the past year.
Indicates whether the respondent has misused Soma products in the past year.
Indicates whether the respondent has misused other tranquilizers in the past year.
Relates the misuse category to the frequency of responses.
Relates the misuse category to the percentage of responses.
